lead_paragraph: HANIGSBERG--Phyllis Hertz, 102, formerly of Rego Park, NY, died Monday, June 27th at home in Stamford, CT. Pre- deceased by husband Murray J. Hanigsberg, M.D. Much adored and admired wife, mother, grandmother, great- grandmother, aunt, friend and RN. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  HANIGSBERG, PHYLLIS HERTZ

snippet: HANIGSBERG--Phyllis Hertz, 102, formerly of Rego Park, NY, died Monday, June 27th at home in Stamford, CT. Pre- deceased by husband Murray J. Hanigsberg, M.D. Much adored and admired wife, mother, grandmother, great- grandmother, aunt, friend and RN. 1/3
